Home
Tiki Bar
Stay
Stay in Paradise
If you’re looking for the best hotel rates, book into our party-friendly rooms or suites. We’re mere footsteps from the heart of Fort Myers Beach.
BOOK ROOM
Accommodations  ⟶
Visit fun-loving Fort Myers Beach and stay where you play – at the Lighthouse Resort Inn and Suites!
Amenities  ⟶
Our lush tropical grounds will make you feel like you’ve been transported to the islands. Well, you have! Located at the North end of Estero Island, our guests can walk miles of beautiful beach at sunrise or sunset.
Guest Perks  ⟶
Sun, sand, service, and style are all part of the most fun experience on the edge of the Gulf of Mexico. It’s your time to enjoy yourself on the beach, how you spend it is up to you.
Play
There's Always Something to Do
Fort Myers Beach has long been a hot spot for entertainment and activities. Throughout the year, you’ll find plenty to do. Whether you’re interested in watersports, exploring nature, or building sand castles, you’re sure to find something you love.
Local Events  ⟶
Sun, sand, service, and style are all part of the most fun experience on the edge of the Gulf of Mexico. It’s your time to enjoy yourself on the beach, how you spend it is up to you.
The World-Famous Tiki Bar
 ⟶
Here is where you’ll find the latest sports game playing, live music, and always a good time party! Our happy hours, drink specials, and entertainment make us a favorite of locals, regulars, and guests.
Yucatan Beach Stand  ⟶
Enjoy a carefree island spirit, tasty food, live music daily, and the coldest beer on Fort Myers Beach! Savor the island breeze from our open-air indoor dining room, or dine al fresco on our outdoor patio with a unique nautical bar with swings for stools. Take a bite out of life!
Dine
Island Dining
Lighthouse Resort has 2 wonderful dining options – providing a casual, fun & relaxed atmosphere with tasty food, drinks & entertainment.
The World Famous Tiki Bar ⟶
Here is where you will find the latest sports game playing, live music, and always a good time party! Our happy hours, drink specials and entertainment make us a favorite of locals, regulars and guests.

There's Always Something to Do

Island Dining
Lighthouse Resort has 2 wonderful dining options – providing a casual, fun & relaxed atmosphere with tasty food, drinks & entertainment.

Island Dining
Lighthouse Resort has 2 wonderful dining options – providing a casual, fun & relaxed atmosphere with tasty food, drinks & entertainment.
Activities & Local Attractions
Art Walk - 1st Friday
Downtown Fort Myers comes alive ARTistically every first Friday from 5-9 pm! We have lined the streets with local and regional Artists demonstrating and selling their one-of-a-kind works of art with many different styles being represented.
Bayside Park Concert Series - November-July
Are you ready for some fun? Don’t miss an amazing series of FREE outdoor concerts at Bayside Park on Fort Myers Beach from 4-7 pm every Sunday! You’ll hear some of the best local bands playing your favorite tunes while you relax and chill, or dance the night away. The music is calling you!
Music Walk - 3rd Friday
Downtown Fort Myers roads truly come alive on the third Friday of the month from 5-9 pm as local and regional musicians line the streets. Free to the public to attend.
Spring Events
March, April, May
Major League Baseball Spring Training - March
Two major league baseball teams travel to the Fort Myers area for Spring Training (Florida Grapefruit League). The Boston Red Sox play at JetBlue Park and the Minnesota Twins play at Hammond Stadium.
Shrimp Festival - March
The Fort Myers Beach Lions Club Shrimp Festival takes place over the 2nd full weekend of March benefiting the local community. Celebrate with the blessing of the shrimp fleet, a 4K run, parade, pageant, shrimp-eating contest, vendor market, and best of all… the local tasty “Pink Gold” Gulf shrimp.
Rock the Arches Music Festival - May
Cinco De Mayo on Fort Myers Beach includes Latin music, dancers, low riders, a market, food, drink, raffles, and game activities. Fundraiser for Restore Fort Myers Beach Arches raising awareness for the post-Hurricane Ian Shrimp Industry.
Film Festival - May
Fort Myers Film Festival screens independent films from across the globe over five days in different locations with thousands in attendance.
Summer Events
June, July, August
Comic Book & Sci-Fi Convention - June
SWFL Space Con’s comic book and sci-fi convention in mid-June features science fiction writers, comic book artists and illustrators, actors, actresses, vendors, presentations, game demos, drop-in gaming, game tournaments, cosplayers, customs contests, and more!
Independence Day - July
Celebrate the 4th of July with a Times Square parade and spectacular fireworks show over the Gulf of Mexico.
Minor League Baseball - August
During the summer, Hammond Stadium is home to the Fort Myers Mighty Mussels, a Minor League Baseball team of the Florida State League.
Art Walk & Music Walk - August
The Art and Music Walk takes place in downtown Ft. Myers on the 1st and 3rd Friday of every month. The roads truly come alive during the monthly events.
Fall Events
September, October, November
Island Hopper Songwriter Fest - September
10-day music festival held across Southwest Florida featuring performances by the greatest BMI singer-songwriters from Nashville and nationwide.
Roar Offshore Nationals - October
Celebrate the National Championship of Offshore Powerboat Racing at the Roar Offshore Fort Myers Beach Powerboat Races.
Roy Hobbs World Series - October/November
The annual World Series in Fort Myers is Roy Hobbs’ signature amateur baseball tournament that emphasizes competitive play and community service by bringing in more than 200 teams from around the world.
Sand Sculpting Championship - November
The wait is almost over! The American Sand Sculpting Championship returns in 2024!
Gulf Coast Showcase - November
The Gulf Coast Showcase is a college basketball tournament that started in 2013 held at Hertz Arena.
Winter Events
December, January, February
Christmas Boat Parade - December
Usually the first Saturday of December. The parade can be viewed from several locations on the back bay at dusk.
City of Palms Classic - December
The Culligan City of Palms Basketball Classic is universally regarded as the #1 High School Holiday Basketball Tournament in the Country featuring the highest-ranked players and teams.
New Year’s Eve - December
Celebrate the New Year and Fort Myers Beach’s Birthday (1995) with music, dancing, food, drinks, beach-wide parties, and an amazing fireworks display.
Seafood & Music Festival - January
Enjoy local fresh seafood while listening to live musical performances by top musical talents on the waterfront in historic downtown Fort Myers.
Cape Coral Art Fest - January
Showcasing the talents of over 300 artists and craftsmen from around the world. The event is one of the largest special events in Lee County, which draws over 140,000 attendees to appreciate art the second full weekend in January.
SWFL Wine & Food Fest - January
This renowned and prestigious two-day festival features the signature cuisine of extraordinary chefs, delicious wines from renowned vintners, and a live auction held throughout SWFL. Proceeds benefit local pediatric healthcare.
Caloosahatchee Celtic Festival - January
This renowned and prestigious two-day festival features the signature cuisine of extraordinary chefs, delicious wines from renowned vintners, and a live auction held throughout SWFL. Proceeds benefit local pediatric healthcare.
ArtFest Fort Myers - February
90,000+ people visit the riverfront in downtown Fort Myers the 1st weekend in February to meet worldwide visual artists, sample fun cuisine, visit special exhibits and artist demonstrations, and see interactive art activities and performing arts. Supports arts in education through art education and outreach programs.
Edison Festival of Light - February
Since 1938 the Edison Festival of Light has brought the entire SWFL community out for a weekend in celebration of Edison with car shows, vendors and crafts, a 5K run, a parade, and more.

Get in Touch
Contact Us
The Lighthouse Resort is located in the heart of the exciting Times Square entertainment district. This Fort Myers Beach resort is 200′ from the Gulf – an easy walk to the best of what the beach has to offer! Wade in the surf, rent a Wave Runner, fish off the pier and enjoy the spectacular sunsets over the Gulf. Shopping, dining and open air Key West style bars are mere steps away from this lodging in Fort Myers Beach Florida.
Phone: 239-356-7829
info@lighthouseislandresort.com
1051 Fifth Avenue Fort Myers Beach Florida 33931
